item.description:
Update: I won't be able to make it there until 3PM which is the last 45 min set. Feel free to save a seat if you get there before me. Dublin Free Press is playing on St. Paddy's Day 1- 4 PM (Three sets on the hour) at the great Landsdowne Pub in Boston! At 4pm, I will be heading over to The Times Irish Pub afterward so jion me there from 5- 8pm

Tired of battling the crowds this evening? Tired of paying a cover? Come celebrate St. Paddy's day the way it should be done.....in the afternoon!

Lansdowne offers several great beers and amazing food!
So come grab a pint and come listen to all the Celtic music that will be played throughout the day!

Get off at the Kenmore Square T Stop. Walk toward Fenway park

Bring your friends and family! It's gonna be a great day full of spectacular music, food, and the black stuff! Note: Everyone must maintain their own tab.

Band will also have T-Shirts for sale!! There is a limited supply of men and women shirts, so be sure to get yours before their gone!



Be sure to check out the Dublin Free Press website!
item.how_to_find_us: Lauren's cell 617-233-5927 Look for "Meetup.com sign on the reserved table..ask for Lauren
item.name: Dublin Free Press Concert @Lansdowne Pub
